column4: so what is everyone's favorite utility program on ubuntu? im trying to get an idea of what to load up on this new installation.
Pretty much to start with, the same stuff you'd run on Windows.  Firefox, Thunderbird, I use Rythmbox as a jukebox.
If you don't know what to do with it, just use it like your old Windows box.  Do the same stuff, you'll discover stuff eventually.
